headline: Fortinet’s AI Data Center Partnerships Versus J.P. Morgan Downgrade Might Change The Case For Investing In Fortinet (FTNT)
summary: In recent days, Fortinet has expanded its Secure AI Data Center offering through new collaborations with Arista Networks, Monolithic Power Systems, and NVIDIA, embedding its ASIC-accelerated and virtual firewall technology deeper into next-generation AI and private cloud infrastructure. At the same time, a J.P. Morgan downgrade on concerns about Fortinet’s competitive standing and platform recognition contrasts with its push into AI-centric security, highlighting a tension between innovation...
